markdown:
# Shot 00:38.967 => 00:55.120
## Transcript
```
WEBVTT

00:33.840 --> 00:40.480
<v Speaker>Locate the driver assist system setup section, and once pressed, then scroll to the setting you wish to change.
00:41.040 --> 00:46.080
<v Speaker>You can set the distance on the forward collision warning to long, normal, or short.
00:46.560 --> 00:47.880
<v Speaker>The lane width on Rd.
00:47.880 --> 00:54.560
<v Speaker>departure mitigation can also be adjusted to narrow, normal, wide, or warning only.
00:55.120 --> 01:01.120
<v Speaker>For blind zone alert, you can choose a visual alert or both an audible and visual alert.
```

learningObjectives: Understand how to locate and adjust the driver assist system settings.
Learn the different distance settings for forward collision warning.
Explore the adjustable options for road departure mitigation.
questionsAsked: How can you change the forward collision warning distance?
What options are available for road departure mitigation settings?
fields.summary: The segment begins with the setup of the driver assist system, detailing how to adjust settings like forward collision warning distance and road departure mitigation lane width.
